channel.title: Player Rights for 508
channel.description:
Need help, I am trying to make it so that I am owner at Player rights = 3 and I have it all set when I log in it says the owner is me and that I have loged in, but I don't have a crown, what do I need to edit so that I can make me have a crown also?
I would prefer a silver crown :D. How could I edit it so I have a mod crown at pright = 3?

item.title: Player Rights for 508
item.dc:creator: @orcashark orcashark
item.description:
@orcashark wrote:

No double posting. Check your old post i answered there.

Read full topic
